蝡字的基本解释

蝡
rú
同“蠕”。

蝡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rú］
［《集韻》汝朱切，平虞，日。］
亦作“蝡1”。
虫类爬行的样子；微动貌。

蝡字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝡； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1090第07
【唐韻】而兗切【韻會】【正韻】乳兗切，?音輭。【說文】動也。【淮南子·原道訓】蠉飛蝡動。【前漢·匈奴傳】跂行、喙息、蝡動之類，莫不就安利，避危殆。【馬融·廣成頌】蝡蝡蟫蟫。　又蝡蛇。【山海經】南海之內，黑水、靑水之閒有赤蛇在木上，名曰蝡蛇，木食。　又【集韻】乳尹切，音?。義同。　或作蠕、?。

[①] [rú]
["Jiyun" Ru Zhuqie, Pingyu, Day. ]
Also known as "creep 1".
The crawling appearance of insects; slightly moving appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　Wang; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1090 Page 07
[Tang Yun] But Yan cut [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Milk Yan cut,? Yin 輭. [Said the text] Move too. [Huainanzi·Yuan Daoxun] The squirrel flies squirming. [Previous Han·Xiongnu Biography] Struggling, beaking, squirming, etc., can not help but avoid danger. 【Ma Rong·Guangcheng Song】Crawling and creeping.　Snake again. [Shan Hai Jing] In the South China Sea, there are red snakes on the wood during the leisure time of Heishui and Qianshui. The name is creepy snake and wood food.　[Jiyun] Milkyin cut, sound?. The same meaning.　Or wriggle,?.
